price: Et très certainement Nous avons exposé [tout ceci] dans ce Coran afin que [les gens] réfléchissent. Mais cela ne fait qu’augmenter leur répulsion.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ وَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورٗا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni liyadhakkarū wamā yazīduhum illā nufūran
